text: Villadossola (Piedmontese: Vila d'Ã’ssola) is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Verbano-Cusio-Ossola in the Italian region Piedmont. Villadossola borders the following municipalities: Beura-Cardezza, Domodossola, Montescheno, Pallanzeno, Seppiana. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Settlements in Verbano-Cusio-Ossola
title: Villadossola
